Summary: MULTIPLE LIGHT HOVERING THEN CAME CLOSER AND ZIPPED OFF AND DISAPPEARED FAST
divs: Sighting DetailsMULTIPLE LIGHT HOVERING THEN CAME CLOSER AND ZIPPED OFF AND DISAPPEARED FAST. THISW WAS WITNESSED BY FOUR ADULTS AND ONE TEENAGER( NEIGHBORS) I FELT SCARED GRABBED CAMERA BUT IT TOOK OFF TO QUICKLY ONCE MY HUSBAND CALLED ME OUT TO SEE IT.
